00047 function PrintNVPForm($values)
00048 {
00049     global $View, $Row;
00050 
00051     foreach ($values as $name => $valueconf) {
00052         // Model config may be different from View, View displays only this many config
00053         if (isset($View->Config[$name])) {
00054             $class= $Row++ % 2 == 0 ? 'evenline' : 'oddline';
00055             ?>
00056             <tr class="<?php echo $class ?>">
00057                 <td class="title">
00058                     <?php
00059                     if (isset($View->Config[$name]['title'])) {
00060                         $title= $View->Config[$name]['title'];
00061                     }
00062                     else {
00063                         $title= $name;
00064                     }
00065                     echo $title.':';
00066                     ?>
00067                 </td>
00068                 <td>
00069                     <form action="<?php echo $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] ?>" method="post">
00070                         <?php
00072                         define('CHAR_WIDTH', '5.75');
00073 
00074                         if ($valueconf['Enabled'] === TRUE) {
00075                             if (preg_match("|^$name=(.*)$|", $valueconf['Value'], $match)) {
00076                                 // There are values like this: /usr/local/bin/send_sms 123456789 "VIRUS ALERT: %v"
00077                                 $value= htmlentities($match[1], ENT_QUOTES);
00078                                 ?>
00079                                 <input type="text" name="ValueToChange" style="width: <?php echo strlen($value)*CHAR_WIDTH > 50 ? strlen($value)*CHAR_WIDTH : 50 ?>px;" maxlength="100" value="<?php echo $value ?>"/>
00080                                 <input type="submit" name="Apply" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Apply') ?>"/>
00081                                 <?php
00082                             }
00083                             ?>
00084                             <input class="disablebutton" type="submit" name="Disable" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Disable') ?>"/>
00085                             <?php
00086                         }
00087                         else if ($valueconf['Enabled'] === FALSE) {
00088                             if (preg_match("|^$name=(.*)$|", $valueconf['Value'], $match)) {
00089                                 $value= htmlentities($match[1], ENT_QUOTES);
00090                                 ?>
00091                                 <input type="text" disabled name="ValueToChange" style="width: <?php echo strlen($value)*CHAR_WIDTH > 50 ? strlen($value)*CHAR_WIDTH : 50 ?>px;" maxlength="100" value="<?php echo $value ?>"/>
00092                                 <?php
00093                             }
00094                             ?>
00095                             <input class="enablebutton" type="submit" name="Enable" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Enable') ?>"/>
00096                             <?php
00097                         }
00098                         ?>
00099                         <input type="hidden" name="KeyToChange" value="<?php echo $name ?>" />
00100                     </form>
00101                 </td>
00102                 <td class="none">
00103                     <?php
00104                     if (isset($View->Config[$name]['info'])) {
00105                         PrintHelpBox($View->Config[$name]['info']);
00106                     }
00107                     ?>
00108                 </td>
00109             </tr>
00110             <?php
00111         }
00112     }
00113 }

00115 function PrintReloadConfigForm()
00116 {
00117     global $ReloadConfig, $Class;
00118     ?>
00119     <tr class="<?php echo $Class ?>">
00120         <td class="title">
00121             <?php echo _TITLE2('Apply configuration').':' ?>
00122         </td>
00123         <td>
00124             <form action="<?php echo $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] ?>" method="post">
00125                 <input type="submit" name="Reload" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Reload') ?>"/>
00126             </form>
00127         </td>
00128         <td class="none">
00129             <?php
00130             PrintHelpBox(_HELPBOX2('You can apply configuration changes without restarting currently running process.'));
00131             ?>
00132         </td>
00133     </tr>
00134     <?php
00135 }
00136 
00137 // Reset to 0 for non-Dansgardian modules, otherwise Controller complains about arg type of Group
00138 $Group= $_SESSION[$View->Model]['Group'] ? $_SESSION[$View->Model]['Group'] : 0;
00139 
00140 if ($_POST) {
00141     if ($_POST['Apply']) {
00143         $Value= preg_replace("/\\\\'/", "'", $_POST['ValueToChange']);
00144         $Value= preg_replace('/\\\\"/', '"', $Value);
00145 
00146         if ($View->Controller($Output, 'SetConfValue', $_POST['KeyToChange'], $Value, $ViewConfigName, $Group)) {
00147             cwwui_syslog(LOG_NOTICE, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, 'Configuration changed: '.$_POST['ConfFile'].': '.$_POST['KeyToChange'].' = '.$_POST['ValueToChange']);
00148         }
00149     }
00150     else if ($_POST['Disable']) {
00152         if ($View->Controller($Output, 'DisableConf', RemoveBackSlashes($_POST['KeyToChange']), $ViewConfigName, $Group)) {
00153             cwwui_syslog(LOG_NOTICE, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, 'Configuration disabled: '.$_POST['ConfFile'].': '.$_POST['KeyToChange']);
00154         }
00155     }
00156     else if ($_POST['Enable']) {
00158         if ($View->Controller($Output, 'EnableConf', RemoveBackSlashes($_POST['KeyToChange']), $ViewConfigName, $Group)) {
00159             cwwui_syslog(LOG_NOTICE, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, 'Configuration enabled: '.$_POST['ConfFile'].': '.$_POST['KeyToChange']);
00160         }
00161     }
00162     else if ($_POST['Reload']) {
00163         if ($View->Controller($Output, 'Reload')) {
00164             cwwui_syslog(LOG_NOTICE, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, 'Configuration reloaded');
00165         }
00166     }
00167 }
00168 
00169 $View->SetSessionFilterGroup();
00170 
00171 require_once($VIEW_PATH.'header.php');
00172 
00173 if (isset($PRINT_GROUP_FORM) && $PRINT_GROUP_FORM) {
00174     $View->PrintFilterGroupForm();
00175     $Group= $_SESSION[$View->Model]['Group'];
00176 }
00177 ?>
00178 <table id="nvp">
00179     <?php
00180     $Row= 1;
00181     if (isset($ReloadConfig) && $ReloadConfig) {
00182         $Class= $Row++ % 2 == 0 ? 'evenline' : 'oddline';
00183         PrintReloadConfigForm();
00184     }
00185 
00186     if (isset($CustomFunc)) {
00187         $Class= $Row++ % 2 == 0 ? 'evenline' : 'oddline';
00188         $CustomFunc($CustomFuncParam);
00189     }
00190 
00191     if ($View->Controller($output, 'GetConfigValues', $ViewConfigName, $Group)) {
00192         PrintNVPForm(unserialize($output[0]));
00193     }
00194     ?>
00195 </table>
00196 <?php
00197 PrintHelpWindow($View->ConfHelpMsg);
00198 require_once($VIEW_PATH.'footer.php');
00199 ?>
